member.name: T:IDroid.Adb.AdbCommand
member.summary: Helps you to execute and manage Adb Commands.

member.name: M:IDroid.Adb.AdbCommand.ExecuteCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Executes the given AdbCommand and returns an IDroidResponse containing the execution results.

member.name: T:IDroid.Adb.AdbDeviceAdapter
member.summary: Helps you to manage the connected Android devices.

member.name: P:IDroid.Adb.AdbDeviceAdapter.DeviceCollection
member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of the Android Devices connected to the computer.

member.summary: Returns a IDroidDevice which satisfies the given data.

member.summary: Loads the connected Android devices into the AdbDeviceAdapter.

member.summary: Installs Android Debug Tools into root directory.

member.name: M:IDroid.Adb.AdbInitializer.RunDaemon
member.summary: Runs the Adb Daemon.

member.name: T:IDroid.Adb.AdbNetworkAdapter
member.summary: Helps you to manage network connections for an IDroidDevice.

member.name: P:IDroid.Adb.AdbNetworkAdapter.GetDeviceIPAddress
member.summary: Returns a read-only IPAddress of the selected IDroidDevice.

member.name: M:IDroid.Adb.AdbNetworkAdapter.ToggleWiFi
member.summary: Changes WiFi State of device [ON-OFF]. [Note: This will only work when the device is unlocked.]

member.name: M:IDroid.Adb.AdbNetworkAdapter.ToggleBluetooth
member.summary: Changes Bluetooth State of device [ON-OFF]. [Note: This will only work when the device is unlocked.]
